Reviews.Title: Great Little tv!
Reviews.Author: P. Nevado
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tv perfect for the bedroom.  After adjusting the picture, it looks amazing, for the size.  I was able to get this TV for $129.99 on here thanks to Amazon's TV price match guarantee, and the shipping was amazing.  I'm a Prime member but even I was impressed at how fast it took to get to my house.  From order to delivery, was lest than 24 hours, and I chose 2 day shipping so two thumbs up to amazon for that.  The only con, is that there is one stuck pixel that stays blue when the tv is on, but it's only a minor problem, not worth the hassle of returning though.  All in all Great TV!

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't buy again
Reviews.Author: Hammy
Reviews.Content: Pros: Great resolution, great brightness and contrast.  High definition material really has that LCD "pop".Cons: Terrible motion handling with any fast movement.  Regular 60 hz is simply atrocious with tons of judder and artifacting during fast movement. Turning on 120hz helps (not completely though) but I hate the soap opera effect.  Also, no tint control which is ridiculous. There is a definite red tint bias and you are powerless to change it.Bottom line: If you are not discerning and just want a large hd tv go for it. Otherwise, stay away.

Reviews.Title: Haier TV from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Caroline Rohrbach
Reviews.Content: Nice size and shape for my needs. The sound is quite sharp and tinny. I wish there was a way to improve the sound.

Reviews.Title: Good 26 inch LCD for the price
Reviews.Author: deninNC
Reviews.Content: We are happy with our 26 inch flat screen purchase.  We don't have cable or watch that much TV, and bought this flat screen mainly to watch movies and play the occasional video game (we do use an HD antenna to get a few local channels of free TV).  As this is our first flat screen TV we were not aware that an additional sound system of some sort is necessary, and we did have to purchase a sound bar to go with it.  Overall, the picture is pretty good although you have to be right in front of the screen to have the best view.

Reviews.Title: Super happy with it. SO worth of my money
Reviews.Author: Rachel Wu
Reviews.Content: Very good quality. nice finish. I didn't want to get it before, but my husband insisted. It's so worth it. It's even better than the $1500 TV. Love it

Reviews.Title: Very nice, but some slight problems
Reviews.Author: Erie Liver
Reviews.Content: The Haier picture is very nice and the sound is good for use in the bedroom.I do have a problem with the speed of the channel changing - very slow.  It seems the channel either zooms up/down if you hold the button or changes to the next channel and you have to wait a long pause for the channel to appear before you can change it again.  Not surfer friendly.Also the channel number in the upper right corner of the screen is a very small font.  I have fairly good eyesight, but can't read the number from bed.  What is strange is the box that appears with the number in it is 2x bigger than the number, but the number size is not configurable in the settings.Nice picture and sound for the price.

Reviews.Title: not everything works
Reviews.Author: Jon N
Reviews.Content: I will say the picture is good on the TV, but that's about where the good items end.  The TV is not compatible with a DISH network remote, and the volume function on the remote for the TV stopped working as well.  Their Tech support is non existent.

Reviews.Title: NOT WORTH IT AT ANY PRICE!
Reviews.Author: L. J. Castro "Lenman"
Reviews.Content: We are waiting for our THIRD REPLACEMENT. We received our purchase within a week, the TV had a problem tuning the channels over the air.  The company took 2 days to decide the tuner was bad.  We returned it and received a replacement 3 weeks later. The replacement had the same problem, we sent it back the same day.  At this time we are waiting for another TV.  The company does not have TV available and do not know when 1  will be.It has been another 3 weeks.

Reviews.Title: washed out picture  bad response from remote
Reviews.Author: Bruce Lenocker
Reviews.Content: Even after adjusting the picture for color etc  is still lower quality than sets of comparable price and size.  when using the remote it sometimes freezes on a chanel  and takes loner than it should to respond and move on to next chanel.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Alex Marrero "To be forgotten, is worse than ...
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something a little bigger for a PC monitor and stumbled across this beauty. I could not believe how fast it came and even though it listed slight blemish I didn't see a thing wrong with it and it looks so nice!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: clifton
Reviews.Content: just what i ordered i like the ear phone jack as well as the other inputs just whate i ordered the price was good to

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: CSJ
Reviews.Content: After doing some research, I decided to go with this TV based on the favorable reviews and the price. I am very happy with my purchase. It's the perfect size for my room and the sound is good. I would definitely purchase this again.

Reviews.Title: TV Ports did not work
Reviews.Author: Webba
Reviews.Content: Used the TV for a couple months, the HDMI ports went out.  I was told that I would have someone come to my house to fix it but no one ever came.  Three months later they are finally replacing the TV with a lower quality one because they do not have this one in stock!!!!!!! I was in several "wrong" support queues, was told I would get multiple call backs but never did........  Horrible experience.  I would not buy another Haier TV or recommend one to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: carl anderson
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this item. I did and had to return it within 2 days because how bad the picture quality on this thing was.

Reviews.Title: I had Haier expectations
Reviews.Author: cyco
Reviews.Content: Like many of the reviews warned, the picture quality is not as good as I had expected.  I am also disappointed in the audio.  On many TV programs, I can barely hear conversations when the volume is maxed out even though I am only 6 feet away from the unit.  I bought it for my bedroom, so it will do, but if had it to do over I'd pay a little more for something of better quality or a lot less expecting to have a "fair" TV

Reviews.Title: Dead Pixel
Reviews.Author: Ronald L. Esarey
Reviews.Content: Besides that,and to me its not a big deal for and for an extra room tv,who cares,its the size of a pin.I like the picture,the sounds is not bad at all,I do not see why the complaints on that.All the connections you need for a set this size,was a easy setup,and a great deal!!The off air tuner pulls in channels very well with a 10.00 antenna.

Reviews.Title: It's OK, nothing more
Reviews.Author: Jazz
Reviews.Content: I was in a hurry and needed a new TV sooner than later. I was not very particular about the specifics. It did not need to be fancy. It just needed to have a good picture and sound. This has neither.Usually I do not buy cheap. This is too cheap. I would not buy it again.

ProductInfo.Features:
19" LCD color display
720p resolution
PC input, A/V input, USB input, HDMI input & component input
Includes full tilt stand & remote
1-year parts warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Haier L19B1120 19-Inch 720p 60Hz LCD HDTV
